name: Syed Md Mihan Chistie

top_projects.name: CoronaCounter
top_projects.description: It's a script which scrapes every possible data of the Coronavirus Outbreak and also calculates some interesting data and prints them at an instant.

top_projects.name: summarly
top_projects.description: Introducing Summarly: your go-to app for quick and easy YouTube video summaries. Summarly automatically extracts and condenses video content into concise, easy-to-read overviews, highlighting key points and takeaways. Perfect for staying informed on the go, Summarly saves you time and helps you get straight to the essentials.

top_projects.name: ApoDSpace_Action
top_projects.description: It is a voice-activated application that allows users to fetch and display the Astronomy Picture of the Day from NASA's APOD API. Additionally, users can explore a gallery of previous APODs. This repository contains the code and resources required to create and deploy this Google Assistant Action.

profile_summary:
Syed Md Mihan Chistie is a highly skilled software developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as Python, TypeScript, and JavaScript. With a notable presence on GitHub, he has built a professional network of 46 followers who recognize his technical expertise and innovative approach to software development. His impressive portfolio of 66 public repositories showcases his active involvement in various development projects, demonstrating his ability to design, develop, and deploy high-quality software solutions. As a dedicated developer, Syed Md Mihan Chistie stays up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, ensuring his skills remain current and relevant.

With a unique value proposition that combines technical expertise with a passion for creative problem-solving, Syed Md Mihan Chistie delivers reliable and efficient software solutions that meet the evolving needs of the industry. His bio, inspired by "Kimi no Na wa", reflects his artistic and curious nature, which he applies to his work as a developer. As a seasoned professional with a strong online presence, Syed Md Mihan Chistie is well-equipped to collaborate with other developers, share knowledge, and drive innovation in the field of software development, making him a valuable asset to any project or organization that requires high-quality technical expertise and a forward-thinking approach.
